verses.verse: Then I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> in the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> that was <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> there <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them as it were a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne.<s%>

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> in <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> even <S%H413>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H2651>hand<s%> with <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and <S%H2236>scatter<s%> them <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%> And he <S%H935>went<s%> in in my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

Now the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> when the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in; and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

Then the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7311>went<s%> up from the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and stood <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and the <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims'<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> even to the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> as the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> when he <S%H1696>speaks.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that when he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim;<s%> then he <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

And one <S%H3742>cherub<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%> that was <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2651>hands<s%> of him that was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen:<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> it, and <S%H3318>went<s%> out.
And there <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> by the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> by one <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> by <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H3742>cherub:<s%> and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> was as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of a <S%H8658>beryl<s%> <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And as for their <S%H4758>appearances,<s%> they <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness,<s%> as <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H212>wheel<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>

When they <S%H3212>went,<s%> they <S%H3212>went<s%> on their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides;<s%> they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not as they <S%H3212>went,<s%> but to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> they <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> it; they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not as they <S%H3212>went.<s%>

And their <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1320>body,<s%> and their <S%H1354>backs,<s%> and their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels,<s%> were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, even the <S%H212>wheels<s%> that they <S%H702>four<s%> had.
As for the <S%H212>wheels,<s%> it was <S%H7121>cried<s%> to them in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> O <S%H1534>wheel.<s%>

And every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces:<s%> the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>
And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> were <S%H7426>lifted<s%> up. <S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creature<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar.<s%>

And when the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> by them: and when the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H3671>wings<s%> to <S%H7311>mount<s%> up from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H1992>same<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> not from <S%H681>beside<s%> them.

When they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> these <S%H5975>stood;<s%> and when they were <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up, these <S%H7426>lifted<s%> up themselves also: for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in them.

Then the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and <S%H7426>mounted<s%> up from the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight:<s%> when they <S%H3318>went<s%> out, the <S%H212>wheels<s%> also were <S%H5980>beside<s%> them, and every one <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H4605>above.<s%>

<S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creature<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they were the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

Every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H259>apiece,<s%> and every <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings;<s%> and the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%> was the <S%H1992>same<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> their <S%H4758>appearances<s%> and themselves: they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward.<s%>
